column1: 作词 : Dan Reynolds/Wayne Sermon/Ben McKee/Daniel Platzman/Robin Fredriksson/Mattias Larsson/Justin Drew Tranter
column2: 作曲 : Dan Reynolds/Wayne Sermon/Ben McKee/Daniel Platzman/Robin Fredriksson/Mattias Larsson/Justin Drew Tranter
column5: I'ma say all the words inside my head
column6: 我想将我脑海中的想法都一一吐露
column7: I'm fired up and tired of the way that things have been
column8: 我受够了过去那些一成不变反反复复
column9: The way that things have been
column13: Don't you tell me what you think that I can be
column14: 我不需要你告诉我我会成为谁 我能不能够
column15: I'm the one at the sail I'm the master of my sea
column18: 命运之海亦将归附于我
column19: I was broken from a young age
column20: 自年幼时我就丢了自我
column21: Taking my sulking to the masses
column22: 被教导着麻木隐忍地随波逐流
column23: Writing down my poems for the few
column24: 我的诗篇只为那少数人歌颂
column25: That looked at me took to me shook to me feeling me
column26: 他们关注着我 支持着我 与我并肩携手 感同身受
column27: Singing from heart ache from the pain
column28: 自苦痛和心碎中奋起高歌
column29: Take my message from the veins
column30: 自血液和心跳中认清自我
column31: speaking my lesson from the brain
column32: 将脑海中的经历教训高声唱颂
column34: 试着体会美好 透过那该死的
column37: You made me a you made me a believer believer
column38: 你让我开始相信 也开始对你执迷
column41: You break me down you build me up believer believer
column42: 你让我万劫不复 却又甘心沦为你的信徒
column45: Send a prayer to the ones up above
column47: All the hate that you've heard has turned your spirit to a dove
column48: 你耳濡目染的恨都会将你的灵魂涤荡 化作象征和平的鸽
column51: I was choking in the crowd
column53: Living my brain up in the cloud
column55: Falling like ashes to the ground
column56: 似那随风散落一地的灰烬
column57: Hoping my feelings they would drown
column58: 希望我所有感知 溺毙在飘散的过程里
column59: But they never did ever lived ebbing and flowing
column60: 但我却从未如愿 自存在之时 它们便不断涌动着
column62: 衰弱着 受限着 周而复始
column63: Till it broke open and it rained down
column64: 直到分崩离析 飘散殆尽
column66: 就这么飘散着 就像那
column69: You made me a you made me a believer believer
column70: 你让我开始相信 也开始对你执迷
column73: You break me down you built me up believer believer
column74: 你让我万劫不复 却又甘心沦为你的信徒
